user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Mark Johnson (mark@helpinghands.org) with the necessary details for the upcoming charity gala. You can check out my NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Here’s a draft you can copy-paste into an email to Mark:

Subject: Key Details for the Helping Hands Charity Gala

Hi Mark,

I hope you’re doing well. I wanted to share the final information for our upcoming Charity Gala so you can finalize volunteer assignments and the guest list.

Event Snapshot  
• Date: March 5  
• Time: 6:00 PM – 11:00 PM  
• Venue: Grand Ballroom, Metropolitan Hotel  
• Guest Speaker: Mr. Thomas Anderson (renowned philanthropist)  
• Program Highlights: silent auction, live music, dinner, and an awards ceremony

Please let me know if you need any additional details or if there are changes on your end. I’ll keep an eye out for the confirmed volunteer roster and updated head-count.

Thanks for your help, and I look forward to making the evening a success together.

Best,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
Here’s a draft you can copy-paste into an email to Mark:

Subject: Key Details for the Helping Hands Charity Gala

Hi Mark,

I hope you’re doing well. I wanted to share the final information for our upcoming Charity Gala so you can finalize volunteer assignments and the guest list.

Event Snapshot  
• Date: March 5  
• Time: 6:00 PM – 11:00 PM  
• Venue: Grand Ballroom, Metropolitan Hotel  
• Guest Speaker: Mr. Thomas Anderson (renowned philanthropist)  
• Program Highlights: silent auction, live music, dinner, and an awards ceremony

Please let me know if you need any additional details or if there are changes on your end. I’ll keep an eye out for the confirmed volunteer roster and updated head-count.

Thanks for your help, and I look forward to making the evening a success together.

Best,  
[Your Name]
